alert.note: Alert for Caldwell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Caldwell County through 645 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eddyville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Princeton around 620 PM CDT. Cobb around 625 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 74 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
